channel.title: N.I.N.O.H(Noob In Need Of Help)
channel.description: im determined to make my own server but i absoloutley suck at coding. Ive had people saying send me you client.java but that wont help me learn how to code. Ive looked at the first server tut on here and tht doesnt help me at all. I want to start off by just having a single room to see if i could code that. Is it possible to just practice on a single room and can sumbody help me with all my coding needs o and any tuts you think would help me post them or the link here please :)

item.title: N.I.N.O.H(Noob In Need Of Help)
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

If you really want to learn, like seriously, I’d suggest reading through your client.java. I did it when I first started, took a couple of hours, but it helped me tons in the long run.
You learn a lot of how it all works from just reading through it.

Read full topic
